embeds.title: Matrix Operation
embeds.description:
**Plasmatic** is writing a problem for a programming contest. However, there is one issue: he can't solve it and needs your help.

The problem goes as follows:
> Given an *N x N* matrix of numbers, what is the longest **strictly** increasing path through the matrix, assuming that you can only move horizontally or vertically?

fields.name: Input Specifications
fields.value:
The first line contains *N*.
The next *N* lines each contain *N* space-separated integers *x* that denote the matrix.

fields.name: Output Specifications
fields.value: On a line, output the longest **strictly** increasing path in the matrix.

fields.name: __How to Submit__
fields.value:
There are two steps to submit your code for this challenge (Name: **Matrix Operation**):
1. Go to <#743121731480191088> and create a ticket by reacting to the :envelope_with_arrow:! Once you have reacted to the ticket bot, your ticket will be created on top of all the channels.
2. Type your name, your PayPal email, and the code (notepad file if possible).

_This challenges ends in 1 hour, starting from when this post occurs. _
